basic.production: Hainan, Fujian, Taiwan, Guangdong, Guangxi, Yunnan
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, fruiting period June-November
basic.color: Flower color light yellow, fruit color yellow green

maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, likes warm moist environments
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Apply low concentration fertilizers frequently to young trees, twice for each time of new branch growth, once at the budding stage and once when new branches reaching 40 cm
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
